channel.title: Obey the Law
channel.description:
1) [b]OFFTOPIC[/b] If you do not post a question about moparscape, your topic will be locked. You must have a complete question. That means one of these: "?" at the end and some substance in the middle.
2) [b]SPAM[/b] If you bump your topic or spam your topic, or encourage others to spam in your topic, then your topic will be locked. Do not post for no reason. If you wait, your questions will be answered.
3) [b]RETARD CLAUSE[/b] If you ask a question that has been answered many times over, or is of such an elementary nature that the answer is self evident, your topic will be trashed. ALWAYS [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=search]Search[/url] the forums for an answer before making a new post (also, remember it is always better to [b]report[/b] than to [b]retort[/b]).
[size=10pt](...skip to [url=http://www.linuxbench.org/Posting.html]video[/url])[/size]
Do you have any questions about the moparscape rules? Want to say hi to your friendly moderator :) :D? post here.

item.title: Obey the Law
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

[quote=“Trickery123, post:5, topic:40617”]Can WE make Like a rule Before posting a helping question?Not REally a rule but thing you might could do?
Like How you have to do before a tut
Like
Assumed KNowledge.(But not Exactly)
Like you could do

Reason: The Reason Why you think it helps or know it helps

Like that?[/quote]

I have no idea what you just typed. At all. :o

Please edit/Clarify?

that video is super funny it has opend my eyes to the wonder of the search button..

Indeed, I learned more using that lovely button at Kaitnieks.com than I learned in public highschool.

Read full topic

item.title: Obey the Law
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Oh, of course exceptional topics of any sort may remain, or even be stickied, for whatever reason, but this is a rare circumstance.

Maybe a good FAQ, a detailed explanation of an answer to a common problem, or general advice for moparscape users, for example, might be a non-question thread that would be allowed.

If not get somone to warn the people

Oh yes, I forgot to mention, if you see somebody breaking the rules, be a snitch. It’s the internet, so unlike in real life, I won’t break your kneecaps. Click that report button with honor! :mad:

Oh yeah HI!

Hi!

Read full topic

item.title: Obey the Law

item.description:

I hope this helps the spam thing, If not get somone to warn the people
Oh yeah HI!
Oh yeah About the posting a Question thing, WE need to be able to post a topic that will help so, if you will please edit that, only saying you don’t have to,

Read full topic

  1. OFFTOPIC
    If you do not post a question about moparscape, your topic will be locked. You must have a complete question. That means one of these: “?” at the end and some substance in the middle.

  2. SPAM
    If you bump your topic or spam your topic, or encourage others to spam in your topic, then your topic will be locked. Do not post for no reason. If you wait, your questions will be answered.

  3. RETARD CLAUSE
    If you ask a question that has been answered many times over, or is of such an elementary nature that the answer is self evident, your topic will be trashed. ALWAYS Search the forums for an answer before making a new post (also, remember it is always better to report than to retort).
